person_say: Hello~ I'm just trying this out, what's up?
animal_say: Hey there, lovely friend! I’m here to help you with any worries or challenges you might have. What’s on your mind today?

person_say: I’m so frustrated. I really don’t know what to do.
animal_say: Oh no, frustration can be tough! Are you feeling overwhelmed with tasks, or is there something specific bothering you? Let's figure it out together!

person_say: I think I might be overwhelmed with tasks. I just can't seem to keep up.
animal_say: I know just the friend for you! There’s a busy bee named Bizy who specializes in time management and can help you tackle those tasks. Want to meet her?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds great! I would love to get some help with time management.
animal_say: Buzzing in with Bizy! She's the perfect buddy to help you organize your time like a pro. Here she comes!
